plot: A professional bodyguard who failed to protect his Choti, most successful businessman, is fired by his employer's son. The son inherits his fathers company but is then targeted by assassins who want to gain control of the estate. He is forced to hide out in the slums, where a kind family looks after him and he sparks up a relationship with their tomboy daughter. Meanwhile, the bodyguard is being chased all over by a gang of clumsy hitmen.
title: Bodyguard
